name: myalyce_base
description: MyAlyce TS + React base with liveserver source build for testing.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd data_server && npm start" "cd app && npm run startdev"
scripts.installdev: npm i && concurrently "cd app && npm i" "cd data_server && npm i"
scripts.yarnall: yarn && concurrently "cd app && yarn" "cd data_server && yarn" "npm run yliveserver"
scripts.ydev: yarn && concurrently "cd app && yarn" "cd data_server && yarn"
scripts.yliveserver: concurrently "cd liveserver/src/services/database && yarn" "cd liveserver/src/frontend && yarn" "cd liveserver/src/router && yarn" "cd liveserver/src/services/backend && yarn"
scripts.bliveserver: npm run bfrontend && npm run bbackend && npm run brouter && npm run bdatabase

author: Joshua Brewster, Garrett Flynn, Dovydas Stirpeika
